ctx: intros xs i x H_sorted H_in_x.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros xs i x H_sorted H_in_x.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros xs i x H_sorted H_in_x.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

ctx: intros xs i x H_sorted H_in_x.

original: intros xs i x H_sorted H_in_x. revert x H_in_x. induction xs as [|e' xs IH]. - intros. inversion H_in_x. - intros. simpl in H_in_x. destruct (eIndex x <=? i) eqn:H_le. + apply H_le. + apply IH. * apply sorted_cons in H_sorted; destruct H_sorted as [H_sorted_Hd H_sorted_Tl]. apply H_sorted_Tl in H_sorted_Hd. destruct H_sorted_Hd. auto. * apply removeAfterIndex_sorted in H_sorted. apply H_sorted. * apply removeAfterIndex_in in H_in_x. apply H_in_x.
